```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## attach libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(skimr)
library(kableExtra)

## read in data
lobsters <- read_xlsx("data/lobsters2.xlsx", skip = 4)

# explore data
skimr::skim(lobsters)
```

## Pivot Tables


```{r pivots}
lobsters %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(count_by_year = n())

# group by multiple variables
lobsters %>% 
  group_by(site, year) %>% 
  summarise(count_by_siteyear = n())

# summarise multiple variables
siteyear_summary <- lobsters %>% 
                      group_by(site, year) %>% 
                      summarise(count_by_siteyear = n(),
                                mean_size_mm = mean(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
                                sd_size_mm = sd(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE))

## add median
siteyear_summary <- lobsters %>% 
                      group_by(site, year) %>% 
                      summarise(count_by_siteyear = n(),
                                mean_size_mm = mean(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
                                sd_size_mm = sd(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
                                median_size_mm = median(size_mm, na.rm = TRUE))


## inspect our new variable
siteyear_summary

## make a table with our new variable
siteyear_summary %>% 
  kable()

## plot data
ggplot(siteyear_summary,
       aes(x = year,
           y = median_size_mm)) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap(~site)

## save image
ggsave("figures/lobsters-col.png")
```
